welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yangzhou, China! Get ready to immerse yourself in the rich history and vibrant culture of this charming city known for its beautiful gardens, ancient temples, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Yangzhou has to offer.
